    • Method Detail

      • onDown

        public boolean onDown(android.view.MotionEvent e)
        Description copied from interface: android.view.GestureDetector.OnGestureListener
        Notified when a tap occurs with the down MotionEvent that triggered it. This will be triggered immediately for every down event. All other events should be preceded by this.
        Specified by:
        onDown in interface android.view.GestureDetector.OnGestureListener
        Overrides:
        onDown in class android.view.GestureDetector.SimpleOnGestureListener
        Parameters:
        e - The down motion event.

      • onSingleTapConfirmed

        public boolean onSingleTapConfirmed(android.view.MotionEvent e)
        Description copied from interface: android.view.GestureDetector.OnDoubleTapListener
        Notified when a single-tap occurs.

        Unlike GestureDetector.OnGestureListener.onSingleTapUp(MotionEvent), this will only be called after the detector is confident that the user's first tap is not followed by a second tap leading to a double-tap gesture.

        Specified by:
        onSingleTapConfirmed in interface android.view.GestureDetector.OnDoubleTapListener
        Overrides:
        onSingleTapConfirmed in class android.view.GestureDetector.SimpleOnGestureListener
        Parameters:
        e - The down motion event of the single-tap.
        Returns:
        true if the event is consumed, else false

      • onDoubleTap

        public boolean onDoubleTap(android.view.MotionEvent e)
        Description copied from interface: android.view.GestureDetector.OnDoubleTapListener
        Notified when a double-tap occurs.
        Specified by:
        onDoubleTap in interface android.view.GestureDetector.OnDoubleTapListener
        Overrides:
        onDoubleTap in class android.view.GestureDetector.SimpleOnGestureListener
        Parameters:
        e - The down motion event of the first tap of the double-tap.
        Returns:
        true if the event is consumed, else false
